name: Fiesta Fist
description:
Game made for GMCJam40

A Beat'Em Up where you try to get to the most awesome costume party in the universe. Some bad people steal your invitation, fight them and defeat the boss to gain acces to the costume party again!

General controls:

FULLSCREENRESTARTEXIT GAMEALT+ENTERRESCAPE

Keyboard controls:

PLAYERSMOVEMENTATTACKJUMPRUNP1- DINOSAURWASDTYUP2- LOBSTERARROWSLKJ

Alternatively, you can use a controller:

MOVEMENTATTACKJUMPRUNLEFT STICK/DPADA / BX / YBACK BUTTONS

Known bugs:

Music does not sound on the menu screen when you start the game. To solve this, start playing on any mode (1p or 2p game). Then restart the game, you should be able to listen to the music on the menu screen

Developer: Cristobal

Artist: MatthewPattel

The game audio was made by the following external people

UI Sounds - Kenney
Soundtrack - Final Punch by maxstack
